item.title: Report E-2024090420
item.description:
Report E-2024090420

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-23T09:15:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-29
  • City: FRIDLEY
  • State: MN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: At 1443ET, XPO notified ERTS of a pressurized canister hissing and frozen over on top at terminal XMP. It was reported that the hissing was consistent and getting heavier. ERTS advised we can send a contractor to check the valve, XPO moved trailer to the yard away from the dock, kept the trailer door opened and monitored the situation. The cylinder off-gassed and a contractor was not dispatched. No waste was generated.
